DOC.brief_summary: This study aim collect Australian data prevalence undiagnosed psoriatic arthritis patient plaque psoriasis . In addition study assess disease severity quality life Australian patient psoriasis attend specialist dermatology clinic .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Prevalence Of Undiagnosed Psoriatic Arthritis In Patients With Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: Consecutive psoriasis patient see site invite participate study
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis plaque psoriasis > = 18 year age Able complete Englishlanguage questionnaire Participation interventional clinical trial previous 3 month Known rheumatologistconfirmed psoriatic arthritis
